prompt: Develop a minimalist QR code scanner page with a pure white background. Include a square viewfinder with a thin purple border and rounded corners, centered on the screen. Place a compact 'QR Scan' title above the viewfinder in a bold black font. Below, add a concise instructional text 'Point at QR code' in a light purple font. Position a small flashlight toggle button at the bottom-right corner with a purple icon and no label, using purple as the accent color. Include a gallery button in the bottom-left corner with a purple icon. Emphasize simplicity with minimal padding and a clean, uncluttered design.
